name: A. Divisibility Problem
statement: You are given two positive integers  and . In one move you can increase  by  (replace  with ). Your task is to find the minimum number of moves you need to do in order to make  divisible by . It is possible, that you have to make  moves, as  is already divisible by . You have to answer  independent test cases.
input: The first line of the input contains one integer  () — the number of test cases. Then  test cases follow. The only line of the test case contains two integers  and  ().
output: For each test case print the answer — the minimum number of moves you need to do in order to make  divisible by .
tutorial: If  ( is divisible by ), just print . Otherwise, we need exactly  moves to make zero remainder of  modulo .  is modulo operation.
